caption.p: ( A) Current presence points of D. involucrata within and outside existing protected areas (nature reserves) of China. ( B) Modeled potential habitats with and without protection under the present climate in China, with areas proposed for conservation. ( C) Predicted potential habitats with and without protection under a future 2070 climate in China, with areas proposed for conservation, exemplified by the scenario 2070-CCSM RCP 2.6. Purple lines: national boundaries between China and India (at issue). Maps were generated using the software ArcGIS v. 10.2.
